AI Description: r-progress is a simple yet versatile R package that provides functionality for creating progress bars within R scripts or functions. It offers a convenient way to visualize the progress of tasks that might take longer to complete, enhancing user experience and providing real-time feedback on the status of the computation.
Core Features:
1. Customizable progress bars
2. Support for parallel computations
3. Flexible formatting options
4. Multi-platform compatibility
5. Lightweight and easy to integrate
General Tags: R Package, Progress Bar, User Experience, Task Monitoring
